string.text: Defend the bandit base
Defend the bandit base from the enemy attack.
Bring Napr two thousand in cash when it gets dark
Buy a medkit from Wild Napr at the flea market for 2,000. Major deals like this at the flea market only take place at night.
Bring Wild Napr the old PDA
Bring Wild Napr at the flea market the old PDA, found under the false bottom of the toolbox in Freshy’s destroyed camp.
Kill the traitor
Kill Stringov for leading you into an ambush.
Take over the flea market together with the bandits
Massacre the diggers at the flea market to teach the others a lesson, and make sure that one of the bandits stays there to guard it.
Take the old PDA from the toolbox
Take the old PDA in Freshy’s camp to bring to Wild Napr. The PDA should be under the false bottom of the toolbox.
Take the old PDA from Freshy’s camp
Take Freshy’s old PDA from him at the camp to bring to Wild Napr. If Freshy is not there, take the PDA from under the false bottom of the toolbox.
Take the things from Stringov’s body
Search Stringov’s body and take everything valuable.
Bring two thousand to Stringov
Bring Stringov 2,000 in cash to buy a batch of smuggled weapons.
Take out a guy known as Stringov
Kill a guy called Stringov per Yoga’s instructions.
Take out the smuggler and diggers
Kill the smuggler and the diggers who want to buy weapons from him.
Destroy the Night Hunters
Find and destroy the creatures that hunt diggers. You can start looking at the place where they attacked the survivor’s group. It is likely that they can only be found at night.
Eliminate the guards at the bandit concentration camp
Free the captives together with the digger squad after eliminating the bandit concentration camp guards.
Meet the digger squad
Meet the digger squad and lead the attack on the bandit concentration camp.
Talk to Wild Napr
Find out what important business Wild Napr wanted to talk to you about at the flea market.
Get information from the digger messenger
Talk to the digger messenger to find out where Fang went.
Find Fang
Find Fang in the basement by following his PDA signal.
Catch up with Fang
Catch up with Fang by following his PDA signal.
Find the stash
Find Fang’s group’s stash.
Get information about Fang from the diggers
Try to find out Fang’s whereabouts from the diggers he went to see according to the trader.
Pick up Fang’s PDA
Pick up the PDA that Fang dropped.
Follow Fang to the Dark Valley
Follow Fang to the Dark Valley.
Kill the blind dogs
Kill the blind dogs that have cornered the digger messenger in the valley.
Search the digger’s body
Search the digger’s body for information about Fang.
Collect your reward from Tooth
Go see Tooth the trader and collect a reward for clearing the flea market.
Take the shooter from the stash
Take the shooter Yoga talked about from the stash in the anomaly.
Take the loot from the stash
Take the loot from the old stash used by the diggers that were freed from the concentration camp.
Demand a reward from Yoga
Demand an additional reward from Yoga for clearing the flea market.
Find information about reinforced body armor
Bring Limpid a bottle of booze and some information about reinforced army body armor. In return he may be able to install something similar on a body suit.
Find information about screening a suit

Limpid’s never heard of psy-emissions, but if you provide him with all the necessary information, he could assemble and install a system on a suit that would protect the wearer against these emissions.
Find information about a closed-cycle breathing module
Limpid, the bandit technician, can make any kind of modification, but to install a closed-cycle breathing module on a suit he needs additional information.
Get your items back
Get back the items taken by the bandits near the flea market.
Return the Chaser 13

Well, here’s a story: one of our fellas caught some lame digger and took him for a walk between some anomalies. They both copped it in a Vortex and I don’t have a problem with that, but that fella borrowed my Chaser for the job and it’s still there. If you could get it back, that would be real nice.
Find the modified weapon

Hey brother, there’s something you can do for me. We were sitting at Limpid’s and he was making a real good shooter for some fella, all mods and shit. Well, that fella and our boss didn’t get on too well, so Yoga told us to make that fella disappear. Well, we chased him into a bunch of anomalies nice and quiet, but that shooter is still there. Bring me that weapon and I’ll make sure Tooth don’t hold back with the reward.
Deliver a bottle of Cossacks vodka

Buddy, help me out and bring me some booze, would you? Just make sure, it’s not the crap everyone else is drinking. I hid a couple of bottles of the good stuff in a decent spot but I can’t go there myself right now. Go pick it up for me and make sure nobody sees you going there, OK?
Return the rookie’s jacket

A guy came here from the Cordon the other day, one of them green and annoying types. He told everyone and his dog about his magic jacket, which he claimed could withstand any anomaly. I heard that even when the bandits captured him he wouldn’t shut up until they chased him into a Vortex. Well, the poor bastard was right - the jacket survived the anomaly without a scratch. I could find a use for that jacket if you could bring it to me.
Bring back the inscribed pistol

Yeah, you can help me with something. I had a pistol and it was nothing special but I got it from my grandpa. I lost it in a mess… We got drunk and decided to scare the bandits during the night. When it got dark we crawled up to a camp we’d picked out during the day and started imitating mutant voices. It turned out there weren’t any bandits there, and we got attacked by two bloodsuckers instead. I barely made it out alive and I even dropped my pistol back there!
